description: Real-world Ruby and Rails patterns extracted from production codebases. Battle-tested code examples, modern best practices, and pragmatic architectural decisions.
rules: Use modern Rails 7+ patterns with Hotwire (Turbo + Stimulus)
Follow Rails conventions and built-in features over external dependencies
Use concerns for model and controller organization
Implement real-time features with ActionCable and Turbo Streams
Use direct routes for clean, RESTful URL helpers
Keep controllers lean by moving logic to models and service objects
Prefer SQLite for simple deployments with proper indexing
Use ActionText for rich text content and @mentions
Implement cursor-based pagination for better performance
Use signed IDs for tamper-proof URL tokens
Follow Single Table Inheritance patterns for type hierarchies
